text: Luján de Cuyo Department Luján de Cuyo is a department located in the northwest of Mendoza Province in Argentina. The provincial subdivision has a population of about 104,000 inhabitants in an area of , and its capital city is Luján de Cuyo, which is located around from the Capital federal. ==Districts== *Agrelo *Carrodilla *Chacras de Coria *El Carrizal *La Puntilla *Las Compuertas *Luján de Cuyo *Mayor Drummond *Perdriel *Potrerillos *Ugarteche *Vistalba ==See also== *Mendoza wine ==External links== The Andes range in Luján de Cuyo * Municipal Site (Spanish) *Satellelite Photograph of Luján de Cuyo *Tourist Guide (Spanish) Category:1855 establishments in Argentina Category:Departments of Mendoza Province
